value.latex:
Soit $f : {[0,1]} \to \R$ continue positive. On pose $A =  \int_{t=0}^1 f(t)\,d t$.

Montrer que $\sqrt{1+A^2} \le  \int_{t=0}^1 \sqrt{1+f^2(t)}\,d t \le 1+A$.
value.html:
Soit \(f : {[0,1]} \to \R\) continue positive. On pose \(A = \int_{t=0}^1 f(t)\,d t\).

Montrer que \(\sqrt{1+A^2} \le \int_{t=0}^1 \sqrt{1+f^2(t)}\,d t \le 1+A\).
